title: Samsung Optical Smart Hub SE-208BW DVD/CD

posts.text:
Samsung Optical Smart Hub SE-208BW verð 20,000
Samsung SE-208BW optical SmartHub Wi-Fi streamer for USB Storage and DVD/CD
Drive Type: External Optical SmartHub DVD Writer
Interface: USB 2.0
Buffer Memory: 1MB
Average Seek Time: DVD-ROM - 190ms; CD-ROM - 190ms
Compliance Standard: IEEE802.11 b/g (802.11n can be used)
